- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |snippet_download| |url_drawio-desktop|.
- |snippet_install| |drawio-desktop|.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |url_drawio-desktop|.
- Update the |drawio-desktop| entry in
  ``conf/env/paths_win32.txt`` and
  ``conf/env/paths_linux.txt``
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/external/license-info_drawio-desktop.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: drawio-desktop <version number>``.
